content: A new version of the website available

comment.text: This translation key is used for displaying a notification about a new version of the website being available. It will be shown in a snackbar component when an "Update" button is clicked, prompting the user to load the updated version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'متوفر إصدار جديد من الموقع' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Arabic. A more natural and accurate translation would be something like 'هناك إصدار جديد من الموقع متاح' or 'يتوفر إصدار جديد من الموقع'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هناك إصدار جديد من الموقع متاح

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is more accurately translated as 'A new version of the website is available'. The current translation 'A new version of the website is accessible' is not incorrect but changes the nuance.  'A new version is available' is a more natural way to phrase it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vebsaytın yeni versiyası mövcuddur

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is slightly awkward. A more natural translation would convey the availability more clearly. The current Czech translation is technically correct but not the most fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dostupná je nová verze webové stránky

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is not perfectly captured by the Greek translation. A more natural translation would be 'Μια νέα έκδοση της ιστοσελίδας είναι διαθέσιμη' is acceptable, but slightly awkward. A better alternative might be 'Υπάρχει νέα έκδοση της ιστοσελίδας' (There is a new version of the website).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Υπάρχει νέα έκδοση της ιστοσελίδας

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is not perfectly captured by the Armenian translation. A more accurate translation would reflect that the website *has* a new version available, rather than just stating it is available.  The current translation lacks a verb indicating the availability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հասանելի է կայքի նոր տարբերակը։ (Has a new version of the website available) or Կայքի համար հասանելի է նոր տարբերակ։ (A new version is available for the website).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is a slightly awkward construction. A more natural English phrase would be 'A new version of the website is available.' The Italian translation is technically correct but doesn't fully capture the nuance of a more natural English phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising the English source to 'A new version of the website is available' to allow for a more equivalent translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "新バージョンのウェブサイトを公開" literally translates to "The website's new version is released." It doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'A new version of the website available'. A more accurate translation would imply availability, like 'A new version of the website is available' or 'A new version of the website is now available'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新バージョンのウェブサイトが利用可能です (Shin baajon no webusaito ga ryouyouteki desu) - A new version of the website is available.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '웹사이트의 새로운 버전을 이용할 수 있습니다' while generally correct, is slightly awkward and could be improved to more naturally convey the meaning of 'A new version of the website is available'. The current phrasing leans toward 'can use' instead of simply 'is available'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 웹사이트의 새 버전이 출시되었습니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເປັນເວັບໄຊທ໌ລ້າສຸດ" translates to 'latest website' instead of 'a new version of the website available'. The original English emphasizes availability of a new version, which is not accurately conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບເດດເວັບໄຊທ໌ໃໝ່ມີໃຫ້ໃຊ້ງານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ອັບເດດເວັບໄຊທ໌ໃໝ່ມີໃຫ້ໃຊ້ງານ" is better, it's still slightly awkward.  A more natural phrasing might be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ມີເວີຊັນໃໝ່ຂອງເວັບໄຊທ໌ມີໃຫ້ໃຊ້ງານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation "Een nieuwe versie van de website beschikbaar" is grammatically awkward. It lacks a verb. A more natural phrasing would include a verb like 'is' or 'is te vinden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Een nieuwe versie van de website is beschikbaar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Nowa wersja witryny jest dostępna" is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness. "A new version of the website available" doesn't have an explicit subject and verb. A more natural Polish translation would include them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nowa wersja witryny jest dostępna.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a bit awkward and incomplete. A more natural English phrasing would be "A new version of the website is available" or "A new version of the website is now available". The Romanian translation, while grammatically correct, mirrors this awkward phrasing.  While understandable, it doesn't flow as well.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider re-evaluating the English source for clarity and translating that refined English version into Romanian.  For example, if the source was 'A new version of the website is available', the Romanian translation would be fine.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is not accurately translated. A more appropriate translation would be "There is a new version of the website available" or "A new version of the website is available". The Sinhala translation simply states "A new version of the website exists", lacking the sense of availability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අඩවියේ නව අනුවාදය දැන් ලබා ගත හැකිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is slightly awkward. A more natural English translation would be 'A new version of the website is available' or 'A new version of the website is now available'. The Slovenian translation, while grammatically correct, reflects the awkwardness of the original English.  It is overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the English source to 'A new version of the website is available' and then translate that to Slovenian, resulting in 'Na voljo je nova verzija spletne strani'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Нова верзија wеб-сајта доступна" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "A new version of the website available".  While understandable, it's a literal translation that doesn't flow well in Serbian. 'Website' is transliterated which is technically correct but less common. The structure is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like: 'Доступна је нова верзија веб-сајта.' or 'Нова верзија веб-сајта је доступна.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'website' is transliterated ('wеб-сајта'). While acceptable, the Serbian word for website is often used, making the transliteration slightly jarring.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using the Serbian word for 'website' which is 'веб сајт'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a slightly awkward construction. A more natural translation would be "Novi verzija veb-sajta je dostupna" or "Dostupna je nova verzija veb-sajta". The current translation is technically correct but not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Novi verzija veb-sajta je dostupna

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a slightly awkward phrasing. A more natural English equivalent would be "A new version of the website is available." The Turkish translation, while technically correct, doesn't fully capture the nuance of the English. It lacks the 'is'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "Web sitesinin yeni bir sürümü bulunmaktadır" which more closely aligns with 'A new version of the website is available.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is more naturally translated as 'There is a new version of the website available' or 'A new version of the website is available'. The current translation 'Đã có phiên bản mới của trang web' is technically correct but a bit abrupt. It implies the version 'exists' rather than 'is available'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cập nhật: Có phiên bản mới của trang web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "有新版本的网站可用" is technically correct but sounds somewhat awkward and not as natural as other options. A more natural phrasing would better capture the meaning of 'A new version of the website available'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 网站有新版本可用
